tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    political_opinion VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    age_group VARCHAR(20),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(30)
);

CREATE TABLE regions (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(50),
    population INT,
    average_income DECIMAL(10,2),
    average_education VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE citizens (
  citizen_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id INT,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  party_affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE opinion_polls (
  poll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id INT,
  party_id INT,
  poll_date DATE,
  opinion VARCHAR(20)
);
